content.B010: {APP_TITLE} is Supaplex Levels Editor. Inspired by Supaplex.Online and its community.

convert.HintNewFileWill: A new levelset will be created, so it's nothing to loose.
convert.SummaryErrors: Conversion impossible due to the following errors:
convert.SummaryWarnings: Conversion will cause the following changes:

messages.CannotFlushToStorage: Could not flush data to storage
messages.FailedFlushToStorage: Failed to flush data to storage:

notActivated.OpenCompact: Open or Create a file in <filesMenu>Files menu</filesMenu>.
notActivated.OpenFull: Open or Create a file in Files Tabs.
notActivated.SelectFull: Select a file in Files Tabs.

export.CopyLevelAsDemoLinkNone: Copy level as Demo Link (no demo)

manage.CannotLessThenMin: Cannot remove level because it's already minimum {min}
manage.ImportLevelFromFileReplace: Import a level from file into current level
manage.Insert: Insert a new level at {number} and move the current forward

labels.FillNewEmptySpace: When it is necessary to fill new empty space:

resize.NoticeLargeSizeLags: NOTICE: Large level may cause some lags while editing.
resize.ResizeNotSupported: Cannot change size for this level.

closeOther.Confirm: Are you sure you want to close ALL OTHER levels BUT "{level}"?

deleteCurrent.Confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete the level "{level}" from this level set?
This will cause all the levels following to shift backward.
This action can not be undone.

deleteRest.Confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete all the rest {restCount} levels after current one (that is starting from {nextIndex} inclusive) from this levelset?
The levelset then will have only {leftCount} levels.
This action can not be undone.

notActivated.SelectFull: Select a level in Dropdown list.

levelTest.CannotCopyHereCode: Could not copy. Here is the code:
levelTest.CopyOptionsAsCode: Copy code to clipboard to use in level upload request:
levelTest.LevelUnplayableDueTo: The level is unplayable due to the following:
levelTest.NoticeNoDemoSupport: This file format does not support embedded demos, so a created demo will be silently discarded.
levelTest.NoticeToSaveDemo: In order to save demo for this level, please don't test another level until you finish with this one. You will be asked to save new demo.
levelTest.ToDoWhateverItWillBeSent: {toDoWhat}, it will be sent to {SO} test page. It will be opened in new tab/window, so you will not loss undo history in current editing session.
levelTest.ToReplayDemo: To replay embedded demo in level

maze.BranchLengthHelp:
It's technical option which could be called "Difficulty".
The higher value, the longer "ways" could be generated in theory. However, in practice all large values behaves the same after some threshold, because every branch generated just randomly.
maze.HintOuterWallNotIncluded: NOTICE: The Outer Wall is not included (compared to WpColEd), so the top left cell in the selection is a "way" cell. You can first create a "room" border of any tiles, and then fill its "content" with a maze.
maze.Title: Maze

rnd.HintMinCount: Check above 2 or more tile to use.
rnd.Title: Random
